exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : R f : StepFun a b Hstep1 : Rlist Hstep2 : is_subdivision f a b Hstep1 x : R Hx : Rmin a b <= x <= Rmax a b Unable to unify "is_subdivision f a b Hstep1" with "f x <= RiemannInt_SF f".

original: destruct (pre f) as [Hstep1 Hstep2]. exists (RiemannInt_SF f). intros x Hx. apply Hstep2.
